title: Time Is Ticking on This Deal: Don't Miss $100 Off the Apple Watch Series 10
description: The Apple Watch is one of the most capable smartwatches on the market and now you can strap the latest iteration to your wrist at a 25% discount!
content:
Ever since I got my own Apple Watch , it's been inseparable from me. I've used it to track my workouts, as well as control my playlist and pay for groceries without having to pull out my iPhone. It's an incredible convenience. The Apple Watch Series 10 is one of the best smartwatches on the market right now, and you can grab it for $100 less over at Target. Originally priced at $399.99, it's now on sale for $299.99. It's a deal you won't want to miss!

The Apple Watch's Workout app provides accurate metrics so that you can track the intensity of your workouts and exercises. This extends to aquatic activities too, as the watch has depth and water temperature sensors. Along with three free months of Apple Fitness+, you'll have a peace of mind knowing that the Apple Watch is looking out for your health. It's also IP6X certified, meaning that the watch is crack resistant and dust resistant, in addition to up to 50m of water resistance. The durability ensures that the watch will be ale to withstand outdoor elements.

The watch is stylish and comes with both a thinner case and bigger screen than its predecessor, the Series 9. The polished aluminum case is sure to turn heads wherever you go.

Our consumer electronics manging editor, Angela Moscaritolo, awarded it an "Excellent" rating. She said in our A pple Watch Series 10 review , "The Apple Watch Series 10 remains the best iPhone-friendly smartwatch with a more elegant, comfortable design than its predecessor, along with a new underwater depth gauge and music playback capabilities." This deal is a steal, so don't want too long.

Be sure to check out our other Target and smartwatch deals.

summary: The Apple Watch Series 10, originally priced at $399.99, is now on sale at Target for $299.99. The watch is one of the best smartwatches on the market and can be purchased for $100 less. The Workout app allows users to track their workouts and exercise intensity, and the watch has depth and water temperature sensors. It is also IP6X certified for crack resistant and dust resistant, and up to 50m of water resistance. The Watch comes with a thinner case and bigger screen than its predecessor, the Series 9. It also features a new underwater depth gauge and music playback capabilities.
shortSummary: The Apple Watch Series 10 is now available for $299.99 at Target, offering stylish, comfortable design and IP6X certified water resistance.
argos_summary: The Apple Watch Series 10, currently on sale for $299.99 at Target, is praised for its convenience and features, including accurate workout tracking, aquatic activity sensors, and a stylish design. It offers durability with IP6X certification and up to 50m water resistance, making it suitable for outdoor use. Angela Moscaritolo awarded it an 'Excellent' rating, highlighting its elegant design and enhanced capabilities compared to its predecessor.
